name: YouChooseScoobyDooMysteries
0:
”Alexa, open Scooby Doo Mysteries”
”Alexa, play Scooby Doo Mysteries”
”Alexa, open Scooby Doo Mysteries and go to the Stories Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scooby doo mysteries
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: SCOOBY-DOO MYSTERIES is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features three action-packed, interactive stories, including Terror of the Bigfoot Beast, Fright at Zombie Farm, and Secret of the Flying Saucer. With simple voice commands, you help Scooby and the gang will solve spooky mysteries and expose common criminals in a truly dynamic experience. The first title, Terror of the Bigfoot Beast is available to all users with the additional stories available with purchase or FreeTime Unlimited subscription.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
